title: Dance style dropdown on main screen with cohesive theme

requirements.summary: Add a labeled dance style dropdown on the main screen with the exact four options and show the current selection in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The main screen renders a labeled dropdown control.
The dropdown contains exactly these options: Bollywood, Classical, Semi-classical, Indo Fusion.
Selecting an option updates the UI to reflect the current selection.
All user-facing text for this feature is in English.

file_operations.description: Implement the main screen UI and state for the dance style selection using a native HTML select with exactly the four allowed options, an English label (e.g., "Dance style"), and helper text below showing the currently selected value. Ensure selection is in-memory only (no persistence across reloads).

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent creative visual theme to the main screen and style the dropdown section without adding any new functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: The main screen has a consistent visual style (background, typography, spacing).
The dropdown section looks intentionally designed and consistent with the theme.
No new functionality beyond styling/layout is introduced by this requirement.

Refine the main screen layout and component styling to match the theme (consistent spacing, typography, background treatment, and dropdown section styling) without introducing any behavior beyond visual/layout changes.
